title: Creating reports for the users of Spöreg
text: install package use: load package: Package sporegr contains Functions read sporeg-data default file server local copies. Rmarkdown templates create various reports data Functions used Rmd-templates format data nicely Script automates generation reports data analyse must first downloaded central sporeg database via APEX interface (https://fd2.slu.se/ords/r/aqua/store100107/home) use script need access data files exported central database private copies files. default sporegr reads data : //storage-dh.slu.se/restricted$/Stora sjoarna/Projekt_uppdrag_aktiviteter/Fritidsfiske/Spöreg.

title: Creating reports for the users of Spöreg
text: vignette describes Rmarkdown templates available package sporegr. also describes suggested workflows howto create (possible) modified report single user generate reports users single job. Templates fetched used interactively script. fetch template interactively Rstudio go File -> New file -> R Markdown-> Template choose one sporegr templates. fetch template script use:

title: Creating reports for the users of Spöreg
text: installation available templates can listed:

title: Creating reports for the users of Spöreg
text: create report single user specific month create new .Rmd file going “File / New File / R Markdown…”, popup appear choose “template” choose “Spöreg monthly user report (sporegr)”. Save file directory want report generated. YAML-header Rmd file find “params” block change “anvid”, “year_no” “month_no” desired values. Finally format report clicking “Knit”. needed can modify Rmd customize report user.

title: Creating reports for the users of Spöreg
text: create yearly report users can use script render.R includes package. get copy script run: script make yearly report users years fishing reported.
code: ## Make a copy of the render.R script and save in in your current directory file.copy(from = system.file("scripts", "render.R", package = "sporegr"),           to = "render.R")

title: Authors and Citation
text: Anders Kagervall. Author. Göran Sundblad. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Kagervall , Sundblad G (2025). sporegr: Work Data Spöreg mobile app. R package version 0.2.5, https://github.com/SLU-Aqua-large-lakes/sporegr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {sporegr: Work With Data From the Spöreg mobile app},   author = {Anders Kagervall and Göran Sundblad},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.2.5},   url = {https://github.com/SLU-Aqua-large-lakes/sporegr}, }

title: Work With Data From the Spöreg mobile app
text: package help work data Spöreg mobile app. package contains functions read (cleanup) data files exported predefined queries APEX (datastore). also contains rmarkdown templates reports. package probably useful general public. install try remotes::install_github(“SLU-Aqua-large-lakes/sporegr”, build_vignettes = TRUE)

what: Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data — APEX_options
title: Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data — APEX_options
text: Set get options reading APEX Spöreg data

title: Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data — APEX_options
Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data — APEX_options
text: ... Option names retrieve option values [key]=[value] pairs set options.

title: Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data — APEX_options
text: Usually need change root_folder possible also change file names needed. Supported keys: root_folder Datafiles root (Default: //storage-dh.slu.se/restricted$/Stora sjoarna/Data/Fritidsfiskedata/Spöreg) resa File trip occasions (Default: Spöreg Resa.xlsx) fangst File catch/recatch data (Default: Spöreg Resa.xlsx) ovrighandelse File misc events (Default: Spöreg Övrighändelse.xlsx) anvlista File username, full name organisation (Default: anvlista.xlsx)

title: Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data — APEX_options
code: # Show default APEX_options() #> $root_folder #> [1] "//storage-dh.slu.se/restricted$/Stora sjoarna/Projekt_uppdrag_aktiviteter/Fritidsfiske/Spöreg" #>  #> $resa #> [1] "Spöreg Resa.xlsx" #>  #> $fangst #> [1] "Spöreg Fångst.xlsx" #>  #> $ovrighandelse #> [1] "Spöreg Övrighändelse.xlsx" #>  #> $anvlista #> [1] "anvlista.xlsx" #>   APEX_options(root_folder = "C:/myfolder") # Change folder where all files are located APEX_options()$root_folder # Show the new value #> [1] "C:/myfolder" settings::reset(APEX_options) # Reset to defaults

title: sporeg_bbox — sporeg_bbox
text: Return bounding box data frame. data must contain two columns contains coordinates. Rows NA coordinates removed.

title: sporeg_bbox — sporeg_bbox
text: x Data frame containing coordinates lat character Column name number containing latitude. Default "POSITIONN" lon character Column name number containing longitude. Default "POSITIONE" buffer numeric amount buffer map directions (default = .05)

title: sporeg_bbox — sporeg_bbox
text: Returns bounding box vector four named numbers. numbers named: "left", "bottom", "right", "top". format used ggmap::get_map()

title: sporeg_points — sporeg_points
text: Create sf-multipoint data frame. data must contain two columns contains coordinates. Rows NA coordinates dropped silently.

title: sporeg_points — sporeg_points
text: x Data frame containing coordinates lat character Column name number containing latitude. Default "POSITIONN" lon character Column name number containing longitude. Default "POSITIONE"

title: sporeg_points — sporeg_points
text: Returns sf multipoint object.

what: sporegr: tools and templates to work with and create reports from Spöreg data — sporegr-package
title: sporegr: tools and templates to work with and create reports from Spöreg data — sporegr-package
text: package help Work data Spöreg mobile app. package contains functions read (cleanup) data files exported predefined queries APEX.

title: sporegr: tools and templates to work with and create reports from Spöreg data — sporegr-package
text: Functions import data csv xlsx files exported APEX service (https://fd2.slu.se/ords/r/aqua/store100107/home). cleanup renaming done make dataset R friendly. read_resa_clean:  import data trip info (resor) read_fangst_clean:  import data catches (fångst) read_fangst_ovrighandelse:  import data misc data

title: sporegr: tools and templates to work with and create reports from Spöreg data — sporegr-package
text: Maintainer: Göran Sundblad goran.sundblad@slu.se (ORCID) Authors: Anders Kagervall anders.kagervall@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: Create discrete scales for sporegr — sporegr_scales
Create discrete scales for sporegr — sporegr_scales
Create discrete scales for sporegr — sporegr_scales
text: ggplot2 color scale

title: Create discrete scales for sporegr — sporegr_scales
text: Replaces use e.g. "scale_colour_manual()" "scale_fill_manual(). pal <- c("#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#E69F00", "#D55E00") ensures FANGOMR gets predesignated colors according standard Fiskbarometern. potentially also used ARTBEST/MALART
